name: Nafta
text:
Zużywalny (3 zasoby). Jeśli na Nafcie nie ma zasobów, odrzuć tę kartę.
[action] Jeśli wróg został pokonany w tej lokalizacji w tej rundzie, wyczerp Naftę I wydaj 1 żeton zasobu: Wylecz do 2 punktów przerażenia dzielonych pomiędzy badaczami i atutami z cechą [[Sprzymierzeniec]] w tej lokalizacji.

name: Miotacz ognia
text: Zużywalny (4 naboje). [action] Wydaj 1 nabój: Walka. Do tego ataku musi zostać wybrany będący z toba w zwarciu wróg o najwyższej wartości walki. Do tego ataku dostajesz +4 [combat]. Jeśli ten atak zakończy się sukcesem, zamiast standardowych obrażeń możesz przypisać łącznie maksymalnie 4 obrażenia wrogom będącym z tobą w zwarciu (każde dodatkowe obrażenie należy dodać do tej liczby).

name: Vantage Point
text:
Fast. Play after a location enters play or is revealed during an investigator's turn.
Until the end of the active investigator's turn, that location gets -1 shroud. You may move 1 clue to that location from any other location.

name: Pnakotic Manuscripts
text:
Uses (3 secrets).
[reaction] When an investigator at your location would perform a skill test during a revelation effect, spend 1 secret: Do not reveal chaos tokens for that test.
[action] Spend 1 secret: Choose an investigator at your location. Do not reveal chaos tokens for the next skill test that investigator performs this round.

name: Borrowed Time
text: Exceptional. [action]: Place 1 resource on Borrowed Time, as a click (to a maximum of 3 clicks on Borrowed Time). Does not provoke attacks of opportunity. Forced - When your turn begins: Remove all clicks from Borrowed Time. You may take that many additional actions this turn.

name: All In
text:
Max 1 committed per skill test.
If this test is successful, draw 1 card for each point you succeeded by, to a maximum of 5. Shuffle each weakness drawn by this effect back into your deck without resolving it.

name: Shards of the Void
text: Seal (0). Uses (3 charges). [action] Spend 1 charge or release a chaos token sealed here: Fight. This attack uses [willpower] instead of [combat] and deals +1 damage. You get +2 [willpower] for this attack for each "0" token sealed on Shards of the Void. For each "0" token revealed during this attack, seal that token on Shards of the Void and this attack deals 1 additional damage.

name: Seal of the Seventh Sign
text: Seal ([auto_fail]). Uses (7 charges). If Seal of the Seventh Sign has no charges, or if it leaves play, remove it from the game. Forced - After a [skull], [cultist], [tablet], or [elder_thing] token is revealed during any skill test: Remove 1 charge from Seal of the Seventh Sign.

name: Impromptu Barrier
text: You may play Impromptu Barrier from your discard pile. If you do, shuffle it into your deck after resolving its effects. Evade. The chosen enemy gets -1 evade for this evasion attempt. (If you played Impromptu Barrier from your discard pile, you may evade an additional enemy at the same location with evade X or lower. X is the amount you succeed by.)

name: Alter Fate
text:
Fast. Play during any [free] player window.
Choose and discard from play a non-weakness treachery that is not attached to an [[Elite]] enemy.
